page.title: 16GIRLS PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: "POLO".Game for 4-6 players.An area is sorted out and a leader chosen who goes to one end.She chooses a subject e.g. trees and tells the children at the other end.They think of different trees each,and tell the leader their choice.She calls one out and the person who has that particular tree has to race the leader.They both run to opposite ends and back.The first home shouts "polo".If it's the leader she has a second turn,if not the other person becomes a leader. "TRAFFIC LIGHTS".Game for 6-8 players. A leader is chosen and the others cir- cle around her.She calls out the col- our of traffic lights in any order and children move accordingly.Green-Run, Amber-walk,Red-stop and Roundabout- Children turn in opposite direction. Child is disqualified moving on Red. Game goes on till one child is left in
